aboutSections.heading: What is this place?
aboutSections.body: Pinecrest is what I've named the collection of links to tabletop RPG encounter maps (or battle maps) of a similar hand-drawn style I have been gathering for personal use. I wanted an interface to search them and show others while at the same time I needed to learn new web technologies, thus this web app was born.

aboutSections.heading: Where are the maps from?
aboutSections.body: Artists having been sharing their battle maps in Reddit communities such as /r/battlemaps, /r/DnD, and /r/FantasyMaps. Many of these artists do so as an incentive to find more maps and other content by joining their Patreon where you can support them. Using Reddit's JSON API I am only instructing your web browser to display these posts by the original artists directly from Reddit.

aboutSections.heading: What if I don't want my Reddit posts displayed here?
aboutSections.body: This collection was put together for my own personal use, so I'll probably just find a way to make those particular posts hidden from the public. Contact me using the link in the footer.

aboutSections.heading: Can you add maps I think should be here?
aboutSections.body: I watch Reddit for hand-drawn maps I like that fit the particular style of the collection. Whether or not a map matching the criteria gets here depends on if I see it and if I have time to put it up.
